SEARCH
Package com.platform.auth.internal

Class OAuth2Session

java.lang.Object
com.platform.auth.internal.OAuth2Session
@Entity public class OAuth2Session extends Object
OAuth2 Session entity representing active user authentication sessions Stores session metadata and links to user information from OAuth2 providers

This entity manages the lifecycle of authenticated sessions and provides secure session management with proper expiration and validation.
